After the Buddha leaves, I fear I will not see the Buddha again.
I now wish to make a Buddha image, to respectfully serve it. What blessings will I receive?
May the Buddha have compassion and explain it to me. I wish to hear and understand.
At that time, the Buddha told the young king:
What you ask is very good!
Listen attentively to what I say and keep it in your mind.
The king immediately bowed his head and said:
I will receive the teaching.
The Buddha told the king:
If there are those who make Buddha images, the blessings they will obtain, I will now explain them all for you.
The king said:
Yes!
I will accept the kindness.
The Buddha said:

Those who can make Buddha images in the world, in their future lives, their eyes will be pure and clean, their faces will be upright and handsome, their bodies and limbs will always be soft and smooth. If born in the heavens, they will also be pure and superior among the gods, with eyes and faces incomparably beautiful.
The blessings of making Buddha images are like this.

Those who make Buddha images will be born without any evil, with a complete body. After death, they will be reborn in the seventh Brahma heaven, and among the gods, their appearance will be upright and handsome, incomparably beautiful, respected by the gods.
